DOC.brief_summary: Femoral nerve block use 0.25 % bupivacaine 0.5 % bupivacaine provide long time analgesia Anterior Cruciate Ligament ( ACL ) reconstruction .
DOC.brief_title: Femoral Nerve Block Analgesia After Anterior Cruciate Ligament Reconstruction
DOC.criteria: Patients schedule ACL reconstruction ASA physical status III Body weight > = 50 kg . Patients redo ACL reconstruction Contraindication neuraxial block allergy local anesthetic , sulfa , NSAIDs , morphine , paracetamol Patients communication problem
